articles.title: Being a stay-at-home dad triggered his depression: 'I needed to hurt someone physically but it should not be my daughter' - AsiaOne
articles.description: Kris Tan was 37 and a stay-at-home dad when he felt the walls closing in on him one night in May, 2018. In a blog post which he wrote a few days later, Kris detailed how he "lost it" after a three-hour attempt to put his two-year-old daughter Kyra to bed. "I …
articles.content:
Kris Tan was 37 and a stay-at-home dad when he felt the walls closing in on him one night in May, 2018.

articles.author: Normie Riego
articles.title: Rebisco finally wins a set for Philippines in 4-frame loss to Iran's Saipa - ESPN Philippines
articles.description: Rebisco finally broke through and won a set for the Philippine teams competing in the Asian Women's Club Volleyball Championship.
articles.content:
In its last assignment in the group stages of the 2021 Asian Women's Club Volleyball Championship, Rebisco went all-out and showed just what it was truly made of.
While the Filipinas still absorbed … [+2305 chars]

articles.author: Tan Hui Yee (The Straits Times/ANN)
articles.title: South-East Asian countries give quarantine-free travel schemes a go after Phuket's success - The Star Online
articles.description: Thailand took a gamble in July by opening the resort island of Phuket to vaccinated foreign tourists while the region was reeling from a resurgence of Covid-19 infections. It paid off.
articles.content: BANGKOK, Oct 2 (The Straits Times/ANN): Thailand took a gamble in July by opening the resort island of Phuket to vaccinated foreign tourists while the region was reeling from a resurgence of Covid-19… [+6985 chars]
